entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
